body: It turned out that `torch.multinomial()` was the culprit. I added an implementation of a more efficient sampling method described [here](https://hips.seas.harvard.edu/blog/2013/03/03/the-alias-method-efficient-sampling-with-many-discrete-outcomes/). This makes NCE a bit faster than CE on the 10K PTB dataset and much faster on larger vocabularies. More details in this [thread](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/nce-loss-for-large-output-vocabularies/3415).
